title: Opposition raises SIR concerns in Gujarat Assembly debate; Speaker allows limited discussion on exercise
content:
The Opposition in the Gujarat Assembly raised concerns about a 'SIR' (Self-Inspection Report/Review) exercise during a debate.
*   The Speaker of the Assembly allowed the Opposition to discuss the 'SIR' matter.
*   However, the discussion permitted on the exercise was limited in its scope.

title: Karnataka government skirts internal reservation in recruitments
content:
The Karnataka government is currently **avoiding the implementation** of internal reservation.
*   This decision specifically pertains to **government job recruitments**.
*   It suggests a deferral or non-application of **sub-quotas** within existing reservation categories for various communities.

title: Assam villagers resist excavation for flood mitigation project
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Villagers in Assam are actively resisting a development project.
*   The resistance is specifically aimed at excavation work in their area.
*   This excavation is part of a larger flood mitigation project.

title: Drive launched to make Bidar addiction-free district
content:
A new drive/campaign has been launched in the Bidar district.
*   The primary objective is to make the entire district addiction-free.
*   This initiative aims to eradicate all forms of addiction from the region.

title: Kozhikode Corpn. Budget moots travelling festival for Malayalam literature
content:

*   The festival's purpose is to promote and celebrate Malayalam literature.

title: PM to inaugurate projects worth over ₹4,000 crore in Madurai
content:

*   The inauguration ceremony will take place in Madurai.

title: Farook College magazine Chuttu bags Beacon Award
content:

*   This marks a significant recognition for the college publication.

title: Congress govt. pushed Hyderabad to lows in all sectors: KTR
content:
KTR has accused the Congress government of pushing Hyderabad to its lowest point.
*   He specifically claims this decline affects all sectors of the city.
*   The statement represents a strong criticism of the Congress's governance and its alleged negative impact on Hyderabad.

title: Kalaburagi to host landmark ITF W35 women’s tennis tournament
content:
Kalaburagi will host a women's tennis tournament.
*   The event is specifically an ITF W35 tournament.
*   It is being described as a landmark occasion.

title: RTI: ₹50,000 penalty imposed on four gram panchayat officials for delay in providing information
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Four gram panchayat officials have been penalized.
*   A collective fine of ₹50,000 was imposed on them.
*   The penalty was levied under the RTI Act for their delay in providing requested information.
